startText:
Welcome Admin!!! 

/get_all_questions - Get all questions
/set_start_text - Change start text for users
/set_finish_text - Change finish text for users
/restart - Restart Application after all changes
/edit_questions - Edit existed questions
/delete_question - Delete existed question
/create_question - Create new question

noQuestions.edit: You don`t have questions to edit. Use /create_question to create new one!
noQuestions.delete: You don`t have questions to delete. Use /create_question to create new one!
